name: Michael Chen
title: Controller
pain_points: Engineers hate Concur - low adoption, Conference travel expenses delayed months, No integration with AWS/cloud vendor billing, Receipt capture terrible for technical conferences
desired_outcomes: Developer-friendly expense tool, Conference expense pre-approval, Cloud vendor spend integration
previous_role: Senior Accountant at SaaS Infrastructure Company (5 years)
intent_signals: Searched 'expense tools for engineering teams', Posted in DevOps CFO community, Attended FinOps conference session on T&E
timeline_pressure: Decision by end of month (30 days)
non_negotiables: Mobile-first (engineers never at desk), Fast reimbursements (<3 days), QuickBooks integration, Conference pre-approval workflow
known_concerns: User adoption - engineers skeptical of new tools, Budget constraints as Series B startup, Quick implementation needed (CTO impatient)
relationship_status: No relationship - found via product hunt / community

name: Marcus Rodriguez
title: CFO
pain_points: Legacy Concur interface - sales team hates it, No mobile-first experience, $5M annual travel spend with zero visibility, Manual reconciliation taking 40+ hours monthly

intent_signals: Attending FinTech Summit next month, LinkedIn activity: commented on Concur alternatives post, Searched 'modern expense management consulting firms'
why_now: Contract renewal window + CEO modernization push
timeline_pressure: Decision needed by March for April renewal
non_negotiables: International support (Europe + US), Client billing integration, Mobile-first for traveling staff
known_concerns: Switching cost - 1200 users trained on Concur, Integration with QuickBooks, International coverage quality
past_experience: Risk-averse - burned by failed HR tech implementation
relationship_status: Warm intro available via Jennifer Park (mutual CFO connection)

name: Sarah Chen

known_concerns: Migration complexity - 800 users to transition, Change management with sales team, Data migration from Expensify
past_experience: Smooth implementation at BigCorp, trusts proven vendors
